question:
In the future, more people will choose to go on holiday in their own country and not travel abroad on holiday.
Do you agree or disagree?
text: In the 21st century , exploring the country and not going on foreign for travelling will be followed by many individuals in upcoming years. I totally disagree with this notion and specify some points due to get to know their culture and how easy this way is.

To commence with, several kinds of benefits a person get if they visit abroad in vacations. Firstly, people will be familiar with the culture and tradition of the nation as well as watch their development of roads, houses, tourist attractions and so on. Feel the nature in other nations will boost the energy. Moreover, the economic level of other counties will be growing with the visitors. For instance, the newspaper name Hindustan times in India illustrates that 50% of economic income was increasing last year because of visiting The Taj Mahal by travellers from different nations. Thus, this way would be good for both the globe-trotters and the state.

Furthermore, travelling to another province is such an easy method. As in some of the kingdoms, there is no need for visas for the journeymen. To add it on, a person can do a tour with just airline tickets and currency. Secondly, a human can get a chance to settle there by work visa or 10-year multiple visas or by permanent residency by just following some formalities and rules. To epitome, the survey was done by researchers that the territory like Canada gives the opportunity to travellers of distinct states for the future settling. Therefore, globe-trotting to foreign provinces have many benefits for a living sole.
In conclusion, exploring other kingdoms is the best method to get the golden opportunities in some ways and also for the state to getting popularity.

error_list.error_des: It seems that visas may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
